## Ideas

5 image cutscene

- 01
building in there
BLURRRY Consort Kennels
    - A fence
    - Protesters
    - Cops

- 02
upward angle
on a rooftop two guys ski masks and a beagle
ALF (animal liberation front)

- 03
zoom of beagle

- 04
a crowd of raised hands receive a beagle

- 05
everyone with a bundle
